name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
My stance on farm bills remains same, they give the farmer more choice. My col from Sep, well before the current situation started. 

https://t.co/QW5EvuVJoP

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Of course govt will be concerned if influencers with global reach comment against farm bills.

This doesn't mean the bills are wrong,or the govt is defeated. 

And it definitely doesn't mean you should enjoy our country being shamed by people who don't know the full picture.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Indian farmer incomes are too low, less than half the average per capita GDP of India. The new laws liberalize agriculture and attempt to increase incomes.

This isn't about a twitter battle or which pop star said what. This is about true change in our country. Take it seriously.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Most developed countries have very high private sector participation in agriculture. That's how farmer incomes rise. The fear of change will never let you change, even for the better.

My column on farmer bills, and the status quo- change paradox:

https://t.co/4LADYCDD01

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Read before you outrage. Without the private sector, without the farmer's having more choice, India's agriculture sector will never improve. All sympathetic int'l pop icons should note this before reacting.

My col on Farmer Bills. Do read, then comment:
https://t.co/QW5EvuVJoP

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
India Corona Deaths (yesterday): 137

India average daily road accident deaths: 414

#perspective

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
How self-hating bias works:

Rich, developed country reduces corona cases 90% = Wow, excellent governance, so much effort.

India reduces corona cases 90% = must be luck, fake reporting etc etc.

Give credit where it is due. India doing excellent improvement on Corona numbers.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
What is happening with Corona cases decline in India is nothing short of a miracle. If any developed country had achieved the trends we have, it would be recognized a lot more.

A near 90% drop from peak in New Daily Cases. Thank you to God. Congrats to all Indians!

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
India pop: ~1400mn (over 4x of USA) 
USA pop: ~330mn

India Active cases: 2lakhs (2% of USA)
USA Active: 96 lakhs

India Daily New Cases: 10k (7% of USA)
USA Daily New: 142k

God's grace, India's done phenomenally well in lowering Corona cases. The world needs to recognize that.

Dear #tanishq, most people attacking you can‚Äôt afford you anyway.
And given where their thinking will take this economy, they soon won‚Äôt have jobs and hence definitely won‚Äôt able to buy anything from #tanishq in the future too. Don‚Äôt worry about them.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
I don't feel bad when people don't call me to a party, Bollywood or any other.

I feel, what a boring party it would be without me.

It's all about how to think.üíñüòÇ

Stay your own favorite.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: @SoulfulBharti c'mon. how can u hate on anything with Arijit in it?

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
To all conspiracy theorists (he writes this because...)

1. My Bollywood income is less than 5% of my total income
2. I am not even keen on Bollywood adaptations, digital platforms excite me a lot more now.

I speak freely.Maybe you speak based on who you have to suck up to. Sad.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Anyone who condemns Bollywood has not heard Arijit Singh songs. Or any of the other past great singers. Generations of young Indians have fallen in love or healed their heartbreak with Bollywood music. For this alone, Bollywood is one of the most wonderful Indian things.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: As a TATA group company, expected #Tanishq to be fairer and braver. If you have done nothing wrong, if you have shown something beautiful about our country, don't get bullied. Be Indian. Be strong.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Dear #Tanishq,

some of us live with,deal with and thrive with trolling everyday. If you know you are in the right, as a company people trust, be more solid. Don't let bullies trample Indian unity, creativity and expression.Make a statement. Keep the ad. Stay strong. Stay Indian.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Shocking to see that 36% of people rate their average happiness in life below 4 out of 10. 

explains a lot of the anger and negativity. 

Hope you feel better guys. I am doubly grateful to be in the 8-10 category, where I thought most people would be. 

Focus on your happiness. https://t.co/qiG9eYi4Nn

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: India was made from 500+ princely states. A beautiful federal structure was put in place to take into account we are different culture yet the same country. That‚Äôs how was India was designed. Tinker with that foundation, try to assert superiority of one,it won‚Äôt work well at all.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: A society where an individual is free to live their life to a large degree without fear or being negatively judged or bullied. What we are quite happy to lose right now to restore our fake self esteem. https://t.co/uvc8MEg2H8

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
I wonder what Mahatma Gandhi would have said about #Tanishq ad?

A man who we call father of the nation, a man who we think is so important we print him on every currency note to remind ourselves of him, a man who helped create India.

I wonder why we don't listen to him anymore?

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Good moves by @FinMinIndia including LTA encashment and others. Also signals a desire to increase consumption and kick-start the economy. More and more efforts will be required but this is a good step.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
You are going to have to fix your own life. Nobody will fix it for you. 

Blaming the system, Bollywood, media, politicians, religions other than yours, castes other than yours, privileged people, rich people - none of this changes YOUR life. 

You will have to fix it yourself.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: If fake news is so common and normal, do fake ratings even surprise you?

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Outrage about insane 100% cut-offs that suggest a broken education system.  

Not about some actor smoking a joint in some corner of their house. 

Get your priorities right. Or it all goes up in smoke anyway. üí®

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Anti-success, anti-freedom, anti-harmony and pro supremacy of a certain community. That‚Äôs the dominant narrative that people are sinking into. That is what gets instant likes. 

That is not how India was designed to be. We will destroy our future if we do this.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: The kind of bullying style conservatism India is sinking into, could have devastating effects on our society -both in terms of the economy and harmony. It is up to the new generation to fight this if they want to save our free society.   Else they r the ones who will suffer most.

Don't make me choose. Don't make me hate. And remember, ultimately we are all Indian.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Conspiracy believing template:

Provide (new evidence)

Is (new evidence) supporting our theory?

If yes, great work, share it everywhere. 

If no, make (new evidence) also part of the conspiracy. 

Repeat until everyone else not agreeing with you  is part of the conspiracy.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Conspiracies require tremendous co-ordination and intelligence. In a country as chaotic as India.
To say -  6-7 major national agencies, are all part of some seamless conspiracy -  is virtually impossible. Don‚Äôt get fooled by people incentivised to get your attention at any cost.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Justice is finding out what really happened. 

Justice is not hunting for a dramatic climax. 

Murder mysteries have a dramatic climax in fiction. In real life, it may or may not be there. 

Justice is finding out what really happened.

It's v hard to make something.

It's v easy to destroy it.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
The stories human beings love and understand the most are those with good people and bad people, all separate (Star Wars, Avengers.) We love to think we are good, someone else is bad.

Truth is good and bad exists at the same time, within us, within society.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
When emotions decide a person's decisions - it leads to doom.

When emotions decide a nation's decisions - it leads to doom.

Always.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Freedom. Liberty. Equality. These are things our forefathers fought for. If in the name of 'cleanup' and being 'moral' and 'good' we give these values up, we would destroy something fundamental about being Indian, something our forefathers literally gave their lives for.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Bollywood is one of the few Indian things that works well. It creates revenue, taxes, jobs and a lot of happiness. Drugs cleanup is great, but if in the process we destroy Bollywood, we'd have destroyed one of the few Indian things that worked well.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
"If we really cared about our farmers, we would give them access to the world and allow them to benefit from globalisation." 

From my earlier 2015 column, do read:
https://t.co/8OnKRlPZRc

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
The only issue in privatization of agriculture, is that the private buyer is (potentially) far more powerful than the selling farmer. 
The only solution to this is farmer's collectives, and negotiating teams who can deal with the private players. That will be needed, for sure.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Instead of spreading fear and conspiracies, those who claim to care for farmers should inform them on how to benefit from farmers bills. Maybe make small collectives, or  apps to show prices, demand and supply across regions, or  buyer-seller meets, export opportunities etc.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
My column from 2015, arguing for similar reforms that have come through now. Took 5 years, but good to see change.

"Let‚Äôs bake in India first: Open up the agriculture sector to help our farmers and our economy" https://t.co/8OnKRlPZRc

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Have done countless columns urging govt to open up the economy more. To not acknowledge when they do that is hypocritical. 
The Farmer Bills are a major reform, and frankly needed to tap India's potential as a major agricultural powerhouse in the world.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
We had LIC as the only insurance company. Other private players were allowed insurance which benefited the consumer. LIC is still around too.

Same with the farmer bills. Private players will come. Improve choices for farmers. Govt will still be around.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Learning more about the farmer's bills. However, whatever I researched so far, they seem to be well intentioned and will be good for farmers. 
From being forced to sell to a monopoly, to anywhere who offers them a better deal - it will improve farmer returns long term.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Horrible, horrible reasons people have drugs:
1. To recreate a past high (say, of fame) 
2. They don't have calories (WTF)
3. They are feeling low (seriously?)
4. To socialize with friends (stupid)
5. Boredom (really?)

Finally, only leads to:
1. Addiction
2. Destruction

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Natural highs come from achieving success, fitness, relationships. These require effort. It's the brain's reward system. These efforts make for a productive life.

Drugs short-circuit. They give instant highs, and destroy the natural reward system.  Render you useless. Stay away!

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Don't do drugs.
They mess up your brain chemistry, changing your reward-motivation balance, making it difficult to work hard.
They are addictive.
They can kill you.
They are illegal.
The answer to life's problems can't be in a chemical. 
Drugs are not cool. Stay away from them.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: @navikakumar Am just talking in general Navika ma'am!

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Conspiracy theory template (any):
Believer: X killed Y
You: There's no proof.
Believer: See that's the conspiracy. X hid the proof.
You: Do you have any evidence?
Believer: No. X hid it.
You: How can u assume all this?
Believer: See, you are part of the conspiracy too.

Repeat.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
So tempting to go with the flow, tweet what mob wants, even your heart doesn't agree with it. So easy to get likes, fans,followers,even sales. Just ride the wave,fan the fire and become the leader of it.
I just can't.
Besharam hoon, par itna nahi.
Besharmi ke bhi usool hote hain.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Fitness supplements like steroids
+
High dosage of psychotropic drugs, changed frequently
+
Recreational drugs
+
work stress
+
people trying to bring you down
+
all people around using you
+
shady company
=
scary combination.

Be careful with all of the above in your life.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Many parts of the world, marijuana is legalized - esp for medical purposes. It is also decriminalized in many places.
One visit to Varanasi will tell you that a lot of sadhus consume it. It is a good time to think about some changes in how we view it.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
As a boost for economic growth and farmers, had argued for legalizing medical marijuana in this column from one year ago, well before this controversy. As many countries legalize it, there is a multi-billion dollar export opportunity for India.

https://t.co/eM4OVrFzuG

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
If we liked justice we would care about getting justice to the child who was trying to wake up a dead mother on the platform. 

What we care about is seeing someone posting glamourous pictures on Instagram going to jail. 

It‚Äôs ok to be that way, just don‚Äôt make a virtue of it.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Say one thing about PSU workers who get fixed income and are less affected by economy and this is what happens. Mobs are being collected. Hashtags being made.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
A large part of Indian middle class, the one that consumes news media, the one that's loud on social media, get riled up about random issues in the news - is public sector employed.

You want Indians to care about economy? Cut public sector salaries and watch the fun.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Sections who definitely don't care about the economy:
1. Public sector employed/ their kids - salary fixed. Who cares GDP down 24% or 48%. .
2. Those who have no hope - even in the best of economy, nothing great will happen to them.

They want entertainment from news, not issues.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Why Indians don't care about the economy (apart from 5%):

1. They feel it makes no difference to them directly (bizarre).
2. Cheap 4G data means brain is distracted on the phone to focus on real issues.
3. They only want news with emotions and entertainment - economy has neither

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Some saying my today's tweet about developing countries cannot have same lockdown strategy as developed countries is with benefit of hindsight. Well this was my tweet on May 16. https://t.co/56S1WWG94w

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Celebrate the successful. Don't find reasons to hate on them. That's how successful nations are built.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
A rich person can take one year off for health reasons.

A poor person can't. The poor person will somehow balance health and work.

That's  difference between developed and developing countries. Developing countries can't and shouldn't copy lockdown models of affluent countries.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
The more labor intensive a country, the bigger it gets hit by a lockdown, which is about movement of people.

Rich countries have a higher portion of their economic activity automated and computerized. 

That's why India's GDP contraction is worse than many other nations.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Don't spread baseless rumors on a successful industry that contributes to GDP and creates lots of direct and indirect employment, especially in these difficult times. 

We are dealing with a -24% GDP contraction, it is no joke.

Don't be anti-success.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Lockdown affected all economies worldwide. But rich countries have the resources to withstand a contraction better than poor countries. They also already have good infra so that remains. In the end, poor countries will have to fight harder to come back and build themselves again.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Focus on RHEA.

But the right RHEA.

Re Habilitating Economic Activity.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
A -24% GDP growth means:

- Govt revenues fall even more, as some taxes are on revenues, but many on profits,which have fallen more.
- Job growth v low,layoffs and pay cuts
- Crucial infra projects stuck
- Less capital to invest for growth

Fix: Relentless focus on economy alone.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
GDP growth: -24% for last quarter. 

Requires immediate attention to bring this back to normal. Will affect everyone, eventually.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Wives can be good. Wives can be bad. 
Girlfriends can be good. Girlfriends can be bad. 
Sisters can be good. Sisters can be bad. 

People are good and bad. A particular relationship itself doesn‚Äôt guarantee it will be good. 

Stereotypes cannot substitute investigations.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
It‚Äôs becoming increasingly clear that emotional Indians have been played and made fools of in a particular case, by unscrupulous anchors and keen for views youtubers. The facts are coming out.   

Let Indians please learn from this and avoid media trials. Trust institutions.

text:

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Not one interview, not one line where that boy spoke rudely to media or complained he was being unfairly targeted. They tell you to smile and stay quiet.But it eats you up inside.

Better to vent it out. I am glad I did, calling out fakes, bullies and getting it out of my system.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
You know what his loss tells me, don't always be humble and nice.

When a snake is trying to bite you, don't be humble and nice. Bite his head off, hard. Else the snake will kill you.

In life, be nice but don't let people walk over you or break you. Fight back and break them.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
They tried to break him. They broke him.

They tried to break me too. They couldn't. Before they break me, I will break a hundred of them myself.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
You went to an English medium school, your parents spoke English at home, you read English books and watched English shows growing up, great. 

But it doesn't give you the birthright to insult regular Indians who didn't have that. 

Power has shifted. Wake up to the new reality.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
There's an enormous, unimaginable amount of hard work and anxiety behind any self-made Indian rising to the top. A certain section of brown outside-white inside elitists found it fun to insult such Indians.Not cool anymore. 

It's because of that talented boy. God bless his soul.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
It's no longer cool to piss on the work of self-made Indians. That obnoxious set of elitists has become quiet. First time I am seeing that. 

That talented boy's loss has created this change. God bless his soul.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Many excellent film critics on radio, YouTube and blogs but are not given as much importance as phony, la-di-da English speaking ones. 

The British left in 1947. Just FYI.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Dear stars,

You make tens, maybe hundreds of crores. A country of a billion people loves you. Isn't that enough? Do you really need validation from phony, English speaking evil critics, who caused mental health issues leading to a star's death? Stop patronizing them, please.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
'Maa kasam, mazaa aa gaya aapki mast picture dekh ke.'

'Holy heavens. I was in ecstasy watching your sublime movie.'

Both lines essentially mean the same. But most Indians, even biggest stars want to hear the second. Hence,the vile critics became important.

Put an end to this.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Indians love validation from people who speak good English. It's the ultimate compliment. That's where some critics built profile. They spoke good English but were evil people. Stop looking at them for validation. They are brown outside - white inside people who hate Indians.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: There is one critic who tried to destroy my career and spew venom on everything I'm associated with. He also tried his best to sink Sushant. His main hates a)self made people b) less anglicized more desi people and c)confident small town Indians. I beg stars not to patronize him.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: To the media organizations who hire these snob critics - it's an awful business strategy to hire elitists who don't understand India and think they are better than Indians. These brown outside - white inside people will ensure your organization goes bankrupt. Many have already.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Sushant's last film releases this week. I want to tell the snob and elitist critics right now, write sensibly. Don't act oversmart. Don't write rubbish. Be fair and sensible. Don't try your dirty tricks. You have ruined enough lives. Now stop. We'll be watching.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: The entertainment industry is so tough that mere survival is a huge victory. Everyone has their own journey. Assigning grades to people is only creating unnecessary anxiety and pressure. You managed to survive? To me, you are a star.

text:
Built a mathematical formula for how many rebels are needed to make any state govt fall.

Govt breaking formula for any Indian state:
R (Rebels needed)  = (N-0.5T)/0.5 + 1
Where 
N: current ruling party seats
T: total assembly size.

Feeling anger when someone hurts you is natural. 

However acting in anger may harm you more. 

Banging your fist in the window when you are angry will only hurt your hand. 

Wait. Calm down. Figure out a course of action. And then act. And act one must.

Staying calm and playing strategic is.

Self made people are discriminated against. In already hyper-competitive fields, it makes the job much harder. You not only have to withstand competition, but also humiliation.

Some just can‚Äôt.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Despite all experts, we still don't know:
1. Why disease recedes in some places but grows in others.
2. Why outbreaks happen only in certain parts of country and not in others (for eg USA)
3. Why death rate is so different worldwide
4. Why cases don't explode in reopened places.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: The USA is dealing with a lot of other issues right now. Corona seems to have suddenly taken a backseat there. No longer being discussed or feared like four weeks ago.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: At some point, governments all over the world may realize that babysitting the population, taking away their livelihoods and crashing the economy was not the best way to deal with this. Especially when the so-called experts change their minds about this every week.

text:

Pakistan. China. Nepal (seriously). 

There‚Äôs a lot the country is dealing with right now. Whatever your faction, ideology or belief, let‚Äôs be together right now and be good to each other. 

Least we can do.

There‚Äôs the loony right wing and the sensible right wing. 

There‚Äôs the loony left wing and the sensible left wing. 

I like the sensible wing of both sides. 

I find the loony, inflexible wing of either stupid. 

What does that make me? Confused? Stupid? 

Or. Just sensible.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
We are good. They are bad. 

No you fool. We are all good and bad at the same time. If you haven‚Äôt understood this about human nature, you haven‚Äôt lived. 

So listen to each other. Talk to the other side. Don‚Äôt make clubs. Make a country.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Those who do us vs them all day bore me. Whatever side they might be on. 

Life and politics don‚Äôt work like comic books. There‚Äôs no heroes and villains. No us vs them. Us vs them is the root of all divisiveness, and can come from the right or left.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Self-reliance is winning by being the best. 

Self-reliance is not winning by protection. 

Repeat:
Self-reliance is winning by being the best. 

It‚Äôs that simple.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Absolutely. @MahindraRise competes with the world. Indian movies, books, restaurants, TV, software, hotels, airlines all do. Many other sectors too. Self-reliance is winning by being the best. https://t.co/N3A8lE6K1S

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Never gave a damn about these people or their approval bro. Have always tried to be atma-nirbhar üòú https://t.co/9kzRmnOOH1

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: A lot of Indian companies and brands already compete with global brands and do really well. To me those are the most self-reliant ones. That‚Äôs what all Indian companies should aim to be.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Atma-nirbhar is great. 

But if you are nirbhar on protectionist policies to survive, you are obviously not atma-nirbhar. 

You are only atma-nirbhar when you have great quality and productivity, so you can compete and survive in any environment against anyone in the world.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Self reliance should not mean forcing consumers to buy lo quality products. 

Self reliance should mean making Indian products so good  in quality that they are chosen over others.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Self-reliance is great. 

But self-reliance should mean world class, ready to compete with anyone. 

Not protectionism. Not crony capitalism. Not discrimination.  

Self-reliance should mean excellence, quality and productivity. That‚Äôs what will create wealth and make India rise.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
In USA, NY state: 345k+ cases, Alaska: 379.

Good for Alaska. But it doesn't mean Alaska is great while NY is bad.

Similarly, in India.

Maha, Guj, Del have many cases. Assam has less.

Good for Assam. But doesn't mean Maha, Guj, Del govt is bad.

Everyone is doing their best.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
If we start judging state govts based on no of cases, there's a huge risk of underreporting of cases.

Case numbers are different in different states for variety of reasons.

Statewise Case numbers are not IPL scores to be compared. Let's fight Corona as one country.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Corona is a global problem. 

Judging Indian state govt performance based on the statewide no of cases is not okay. 

Every state is different in terms of people distribution, globalization, temperature etc etc. 

Even in USA, New York state has 345,000+ cases, Alaska has 379.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
The difference 20 days makes.
Two identical polls. 
One on April 8. Another on April 28.

People who want lockdown extended, as it is: 62% then ‚Äî> 38% now

People who want lockdown extended, but milder version: 31% then‚Äî> 48% now

People who want no lockdown: 
6% then ‚Äî> 14% now https://t.co/TREbWK8yNX

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Do you think this lockdown should be extended?

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Lockdown creates a v strange political incentive structure:

Remove:
Cases go up: Why did u remove it? 

Don't remove it. 
If  cases down: see, it worked.
If cases up: see, cases would be even more if u didn't remove.

Hence, bias towards not removing it, despite massive cost.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
80million Americans receiving direct cash transfers of $1200/adult this week. $500 extra per kid.

A family of four is getting $3,400. That is Rs2.61lakhs/family!

That's the kind of support people are getting worldwide to go through this, for countries who can afford it.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Businesses worldwide will suffer.
However later, companies from rich countries will survive or be bailed out.
Poor countries like India won‚Äôt be able to.
Hence, when things get normal, foreign companies will benefit most from the new playing field.
The rich, always get richer.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
I miss:
Work. Friends. Relatives. Colleagues. Cars. Trains. Flights. Airports. Cafes. Restaurants. Office. Gym. Traveling. Giving talks. The sea. The mountains. Freedom. Choices.

I had so much. Never realized it when I had it. Thank you lockdown for making me value it all!

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Long weekend! Yay! 

Oh wait.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Today, under normal circumstances, was supposed to be a 3-day weekend.

Some would have looked forward to not go anywhere and just be at home on the long weekend.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Think about florists. ü•Äüò¢

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: To fund the massive fiscal costs of a rescue plan, the government could issue special crisis bonds, with a 10, 20, 30 year duration. Many people are likely to invest in them.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Relying on charity and benevolence is not the way to handle a crisis like this. All that looks good on social media, but this needs a massive fiscal plan, far and beyond what charity, NGOs and requests can achieve. 

The poor need help. In massive doses.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
The upper middle class and above:
There's nothing left to watch on Netflix.

The poor:
There's nothing left to eat.

#LockdownEffect

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Every one is suffering. 
But the affluent, upper middle class suffer less.

The poor suffer a lot more, to the point of survival. And they aren't on social media.

Every lockdown related decision should be taken with care, balanced, calibrated  and with reason as well as emotion

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Some people say the world will change even after lockdown ends and all this Corona stuff becomes okay. People won‚Äôt travel as much.
Don‚Äôt know about others. But I plan to travel more than ever, whenever I can, because you never know what will happen tommorrow.

text: The real test of a society is during tough times. If we are kind, compassionate and patient; if we can care and be nice to each other; we will survive this. This is a test, not just to fight the virus, but to see the kind of people we are.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Celebrities, NGOs, citizens should and will come forward to do their bit for those affected by the lockdown. Appreciate that.

However, the problem on hand is far bigger in scale than to be handled by good samaritans alone. Comprehensive national level plan needed asap.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Execution.

No matter how great the plan is, it all comes down to the execution. 

If execution involves the most impoverished being hurt the most, something is not right.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: The real solution, apart from lockdown, will come if there is extensive testing, isolation of cases and their contacts. A lot of trust and co-operation is needed. If authorities and police show brutality, people will hide information and make the exercise counter productive.

On that account, we need at least Rs 5 lakh crores.

text:
Lockdown positives:
1. No traffic
2. Don‚Äôt have to meet the boss
3. Can dress silly all day
4. Can sleep more. 
5. Can watch as much screen
6. Can avoid people u didn‚Äôt want to meet. 
7. Helping the nation and the world
8. The virus gets contained!

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Don‚Äôt call it lockdown. Call it Staycation. 

Am on a 21 day staycation. Today is day 1. 

Sounds much better right?

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Try a new diet. 
Make a business plan. 
Call old friends and talk. 
Paint. Sing. Upload a video. 
Make a life plan. 
Cook. Dance. Write. Play indoor games with family. 
No pressure to perform. Just be. 
Come to think of it, these 21 days can be beautiful and just what u needed!

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Don‚Äôt see it as a lockdown. See it as a chance to focus 21 days on something you have been meaning to do, but never got around to it otherwise. 

You can waste this time. Or you can create magic. Use it wisely.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Corona will drive Indian economy to the wall. 

The only positive, is like 1991, we will have to finally act on reforms. 

Coz when it comes to economy, we are like ‚Äúunless it‚Äôs smashed to pieces, why fix it?‚Äù

It will be smashed to pieces. We are doing it right now.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Sensex hovering at mid-2014 levels. Wiping out 6 years of gains. 
Rupee all time low. 

I know people think this is not the priority right now or this won‚Äôt directly affect them. But it will.
It surely will. 
Because lockdowns have a bill.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
How economic crisis will flow:
Tourism + Hospitality + Travel + Retail --> Real estate --> Banks --> Credit slowdown --> All Industry --> job losses --> demand down --> recession

Solution:
Massive, massive opening up of the economy post Covid, even more reforms than 1991.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Exponential functions: assuming 20% daily growth. 

Day 0: 1
Day 1: 1.2x
Day 20: 38x
Day 40: 1,470x
Day 60: 56,347x
Day 80: 21.6 million x

That‚Äôs why you need to act fast, and hard.

text:
Things that can be done in this time (apart from just chilling):
1. Working out using exercise videos
2.  Resetting your diet
3.  Contemplating  life/ career and if you need to change anything. 
4. Doing an online course. 
5. Making a plan for next 12 months once things improve.

To be at home.
To do nothing.
To just be on social media.

The ultimate fantasy of a generation has come true.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: The world is reacting to the virus on a day by day basis, with steps that are short-term at best. Meanwhile, economies are getting wrecked around the world and we don‚Äôt know if we are solving the problem or simply postponing it.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Countries where daily new cases dropped/are dropping:
-China
-South Korea
- UK and Italy (last couple of days)
 
Where daily new cases still rising fast:
- US, Spain, France

After an exponential rise, there is/will be a plateau.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
In all the depressing news, slight positive. The Italy #coronavirus cases, while still growing, showed some deceleration in the rate of growth.
Early days yet, but does it mean Italy could plateau out like China did?
Has implications for all other places as well. https://t.co/rjSQ9wPlwO

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
A shutdown, if attempted, has to be complete. 

Of course, it will have devastating effects on the economy.  But if you want it to work, make it complete. 

Half measures won't work. They only give the psychological relief 'something is being done about it.'

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Theatres and malls closed. Cafes and bars shut. 

Metro open. Trains open. Airports open. Flights open. 

It's not like #coronavirus attacks you more when you are having fun.

text:
While we take strict measures, and they make us feel better, we must never forget measures come at a cost. 

The people who sweep floors in shut malls or the guys who serves popcorn in closed theatres - what‚Äôs happening to their livelihood? 

We must address that too.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Only the privileged and affluent have the option to ‚Äúself isolate‚Äù and ‚Äúwork from home‚Äù and do ‚Äúsocial distancing‚Äù. 

The poor don‚Äôt. They have to make a living, often on a daily basis. 

Stop preaching and judging. Please.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Mom: Whatever happens, only my son will bat

Friends: So we will go play for the other team
Mom: Get out, you are expelled

One can oppose politics of polarisation. 

It doesn‚Äôt however mean one has to hang out with the JNU, Kanhaiya Kumar and the pseudo-liberal  types. Many Indians detest those even more. 

AAP learnt this and stayed away from that set. 

That‚Äôs what they did really well this time.

AAP learnt to be liberal, but not so much to fall into the trap of giving constant liberal agniparikshas. 

Their leader read Hanuman Chalisa. Liberal purists would have said this is wrong. 

But he won. If he listened to liberal purists he never would.

text:
A win is a win and it looks like a very comprehensive win for AAP.

However,

A 42% vote share by BJP is no joke. They have gained and in most parts of the country this would lead to a lot of seats.

#analysisnotendorsement #DelhiElections2020

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
I present analysis of elections. 

I find analysis fascinating and I think it is not taught enough.

Analysis is not endorsement.

Analyzing why an earthquake came doesn't mean you endorse an earthquake.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
In elections, face matters. 

BJP wins national elections in Delhi.
BJP wins MCD polls in Delhi.

BJP loses assembly elections.

Multiple analysis will come, but the single biggest reason for AAP victory is they had a trustworthy, known face: @ArvindKejriwal 

#DelhiElection2020

text:
Hi all,

‚ÄúWhy NRC must be shelved,‚Äù my Col in TOI today: 

Do read fully before commenting. Do share with as many Indians as you can. 

https://t.co/KvQfvuYwAJ

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
If we can just brush the Hindu-Muslim issues aside for  next 20 years, and focus on growing the economy, we can easily reach $10,000 per capita GDP by 2040.
 
Then we can fight all we want.

But my guess is, when incomes reach that level, we won't fight like this.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Inflation: 6-year high

GDP growth: 6-year low

This needs to be our number one priority. The rest of the never ending and somewhat pointless identity politics stuff can wait.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
AAP changed its way of working dramatically last 2 years.

They listened to the criticism and acted on it. 

They are now leading in opinion polls in Delhi.

If they win, scaling up outside Delhi will become a possibility again.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Ultimately no matter what posturing people do, every issue on Twitter boils down to do you like Modi or not.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Effect of 99% cutoffs? A bunch of ‚Äúsmart‚Äù kids who are very good at pointing errors but miss the overall point. Ma‚Äôam ma‚Äôam college nahi university hai. Oh so bright u are. The essence of the statement doesn‚Äôt change and you didn‚Äôt get it but here, take ur ‚ÄúI am right badge‚Äù.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Two big dates coming up

Feb 1: Budget. Will show how serious we are about the economy. 

Feb 11: Delhi election results. Some indication of the political impact of recent events. 

India may be whatever, but it is never boring.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
JNU is just one college.

There are nearly 40,000 colleges in India.

I understand it is important. But there is a limit to how much importance and attention one college gets.

There are more important issues in a country of 1.2bn people I am sure.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: I am going to disappoint everyone who thinks I am in a camp.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: People in India understand serving someone. Our faulty education makes people incapable of thinking for themselves. They find it hard to deal with independent minds with different opinions in different situations. But you were that side na? No, your brain was limited. Still is.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: @seemay üòÅüòÅ

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
I wish GDP had a religion so more people would care for it.
I wish healthcare was fought for like we fight for our traditions.
I wish scientific education was valued like our scriptures.
I wish the country‚Äôs infrastructure was built like places of worship, with as much pride.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: I wish GDP had a religion so a lot more people would care for it.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
There‚Äôs a lot of value in simplifying things. 

It is not that simple to be simple.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Saying ‚ÄúNRC will definitely come‚Äù and then saying ‚Äúbut did I show u details yet?‚Äù

 is like saying

‚Äúyou will have to marry where I ask you to‚Äù  and then saying ‚Äúbut did I show you any boys yet?‚Äù

Be clear. If it is not coming, shelve it. Restore peace and order.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
The NRC is unimplementable due to massive execution issues. 

Time to put it to rest. Not the right time at all. 

With growing US-Iran tensions, higher oil prices and our already weak economy, we need to do everything we can to restore stability.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Many people have invited or welcomed me to their club given my recent specific views on a specific issue. 

Neither was I a member of the other club. Nor would I like to be of yours. 

Sure, happy to have a cup of tea now and then in either club. 

But Life membership? No thanks.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Stand up for what you feel is right, that‚Äôs all. 

Whatever you think is the right thing for your country. 

It doesn‚Äôt have to agree with my view or anyone else‚Äôs. 

But just make sure it is your view. You have thought through it and is not coming out of blind fandom or hate.

That doesn‚Äôt change even if the college is AMU, Jamia or JNU.

We destroy our nation if we do or secretly condone this.

text:
Govt in denial. 

Detaining people backfires. 

Ask Congress, they tried it with Anna Hazare and @ArvindKejriwal   

Ask them how that went.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Why is an law like CAA, technically meant for foreigners affecting Indians so much?

Cause another law called NRC is coming, which essentially assumes all Indians are foreigners unless they can prove otherwise. 

This needs to be fixed.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
CAA is a life jacket. 

NRC is everyone being pushed out of the plane as they have to prove themselves all over again. 

But Muslims don‚Äôt  get the life jacket. 

Distributing life jackets is not the problem. Giving them only to a few and pushing everyone off the plane is.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
CAA by itself not the issue.
But CAA+NRC is discriminatory. This could happen.

NRC:
All prove again u r Indian 

Non-Muslim: sir I don‚Äôt have documents 
Govt: it‚Äôs ok. CAA will save you. U are indian. 

Muslim: sir I don‚Äôt have documents
Govt: too bad.U are not indian.Get out.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Whatever their historical names, there are no Hindu or Muslim universities in India. They are all Indian universities. And they all must be protected.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Many get confused about my politics here.  To be clear am only interested in an India where everybody lives in harmony and we have stellar economic growth. That is my dream. One-sided groupings bore me. I am not on your fixed side. I am on India‚Äôs side. And am proud of that.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Crashing the economy. Making jobs vanish. Shutting down Internet. Sending police in libraries. The youth may have patience, but don‚Äôt test the limits of it.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: The youth is angry. There are not enough jobs. Salaries are low. Don‚Äôt mess with them. The first priority should be to lift the economy back again.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: The CAB required more education, more consensus building, a lot better wording and frankly better intentions. Stirring the social pot constantly is going to hurt us and the already weak economy.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Repeated and prolonged Internet shutdowns hurt business and the economy. Sends a message that we are an unpredictable, third-world country where things are not under control. Even non-democratic China never did it during Hong Kong protests.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Lagta hai Delhi mein elections aane wale hain.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: People opposing CAB are those who want to include nobody and those who want to include everybody.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Pollution or protest, it has to reach Delhi, else it doesn‚Äôt seem to matter.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Kashmir matters. Assam matters. Tripura matters.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Internet shutdowns, in this era of online dependence for everyday life, should be avoided. If at all, they can be done on an exceptional basis for a very short time duration to diffuse a situation. To make it a way of life is draconian.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Kashmir matters.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Tripura matters.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Assam matters.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Shutting down Internet doesn‚Äôt shut down the resentment.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Money:
1. Is important. Anybody saying it isn't usually doesn't have much.
2. Gives you flexibility, options and the power to stand up for yourself.
3. Is a measure of value you provide, though not the only one
4. Is hard to earn, harder to keep and grow
5. Is not everything.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Happiness comes from:
1. Doing work you love
2. Having 3-4 people in life who really care
3. A healthy body, a decent diet
4. Enough sleep
5. Avoiding negativity at all costs.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Time management (practically doing it):
1. Cut your phone screen time (most people are 5hrs+, get to 2)
2. Make to-do lists for next day the night before
3. Don't waste time on bad relationships and useless work
4. End of day, ask, how did I get closer to my goal today?

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
3 things that make a big difference to your success (not dependent on talent)
1. Having clear goals- where you want to be by when
2. Being Positive- not wishing badly for others,taking positive steps when faced with difficulty
3. Working hard consistently for long period of time

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Current Yes Bank issues aside, it is also true that on the consumer side the bank has good products and services. Issues are tough but still in resolvable state, if all stakeholders act swiftly. Interesting to see how this develops. Has wider implications for Indian economy.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Yes Bank needs a staggering $1bn-$2bn in new capital to keep running. All this, while it deals with bad news, massive stock declines, black box loan book, plummeting confidence and promoter already having sold stake. It is not easy at all to raise that kind of money.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Happened with Kingfisher. Happened with Jet. When trouble begins, Indian procedures are so slow and cumbersome that recovery is v difficult. Confidence crisis makes it worse. Worried about Yes Bank the same way. Be safe.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Extremely concerned for Yes Bank.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: For decades, a mixture of weird left-wing politics, fake-pride, closeness to Russia, anti-capitalist stance type policies led India away from USA, and it was our loss. May this be a new era of friendship between the two greatest democracies of the world. #HowdyModi

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: After ages we are truly friends with the USA. Great to be close to the most affluent, powerful and creative country in the world. Stand next to winners, and you will be a winner one day. Stand next to losers, and you will get no where. #howdyModi

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Biggest 1-day rise in stock markets in the last 10 years today! Result of lower corp tax rates. Give investors some love, they love you right back. Whatever revenue govt may have forgone today, they gained multiples more in the capital gains in LIC, UTI and other PSU valuations!

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Corporate Tax significantly reduced today. 'Simple, low tax rates,' one of six recommendations seem to have happened pretty fast. My column on 'how to revive the economy': https://t.co/GYZzZ12Oqc

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Whatever one might say, this govt does act on feedback and tries. Feedback that major steps are needed to revive economy was taken. More steps needed but slashing of corporate tax rates will help for sure. Stock market up over 5% today. Good step.

text: Tax incentives for companies to set up base in J&K, as well as schemes such as requirement to have a local JV partner may help in generating employment and integrating the region. It is time we focus on stuff like this rather than continue the politics.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Clarification on ‚Äúundemocratic‚Äù moves:
1. The Indian Parliament approved it. 2. No new territory was annexed. 3. The region‚Äôs governance was brought in line with rest of the country and that‚Äôs it. 4. Internet shutdowns unfortunate but done to prevent even more unfortunate events.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: If you really care about J&K, please say ‚ÄúThe people of Jammu..‚Äù and ‚ÄúThe people of Ladakh..‚Äù as many times as you say ‚ÄúThe people of Kashmir..‚Äù

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: No point going on about Kashmir but Respected Amartya Sen‚Äôs comments, which he is entitled to, may help international media, which seems hell bent on a certain narrative. In reality, Indian Parliament approved some governance changes to its internal territory. That‚Äôs it. Relax.

text: August 5, 2019. Kashmir is finally free. Free to grow, free to make a future. #Article370 goes. #OneCountryOneSystem

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Kashmir  has cost India so much -  suffering in the state, terror all over, lakhs of crores in extra defense budget, soldiers losing their lives. Meanwhile, hundreds of fancy conferences pretending to solve the issue. Time it all stops. #OneCountryOneSystem #Article370

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Anyone using the removal of #Article370 as an excuse to disturb peace and instigate violence is an enemy of the state.  Let the country be run peacefully. Do not do anything you will regret. #OneCountryOneSystem

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Article 370 never gave Kashmiris freedom. It only created selfish leaders who created a terror filled society and robbed Kashmiri youth of opportunity. It is finally time for it to go. Anyone objects, tell them loudly: One Country, One System. #Article370 #OneCountryOneSystem

text: If we keep vilifying doctors and make them feel unsafe, the best talent of the country will not go towards the profession. This will lead to us no longer having the best doctors we can have and will aggravate the healthcare crisis further.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: I support India's doctors, who are amongst the best in the world. They work tirelessly, often to compensate for an inadequate healthcare system. Still they are judged, threatened, shamed for trying to make decent living and their genuine issues aren't heard. #SupportIndianDoctors

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Key Elections 2019 Takeaways.

1) This is not a Modi wave, waves come and go. This is a Modi sea.

2) Tectonic effects in Indian politics - time will show

3) Modi haters on social media as redundant as a group of uncles or aunties in a park

4) India has come on its own

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
To all who had board results today. 
If you did well: Superb. Congrats. 
If you didn't do well: Relax. Learn from it. Honestly ask yourself what happened (you didn't work hard/got distracted/ this is not your aptitude). Take the lesson. Move on. It won't matter in a few years.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Reacting when our soldiers are killed isn't war mongering, it is self defence. Nobody in India wants war. We were happily waiting for the next Bollywood film or cricket match before they backed a terror attack at Pulwama. They did it first. We had no choice but to teach a lesson.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Great job by the IAF. And great choice of words by govt "non-military preemptive action against terrorists (and not against Pak)". Makes it difficult for Pak to escalate. Josh and Hosh both on display. Very well done. #IndianAirForce #IndiaStrikesBack

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: When you slap us, we will no longer turn the other cheek. Instead, we will grab you by the collar and beat the shit out of you so you never think of doing it again. #IndiaStrikesBack

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: RT @chetan_bhagat: So who wanted to kiss whom? @iratrivedi‚Äôs self-explanatory email from 2013 to me, esp last line, easily shows her claims‚Ä¶
retweet_text: So who wanted to kiss whom? @iratrivedi‚Äôs self-explanatory email from 2013 to me, esp last line, easily shows her claims from 2010 are false, and she knows this too. This mental harassment of me and my family has to stop. Please don‚Äôt harm a movement with #fakecharges #harassed https://t.co/SWeaSCfHLd

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: I am not a vindictive person. More than anything I just want me and my family to be left alone and people to ignore fake charges.  Love to all who supported me. I won‚Äôt let you down. This was my #MeToo story. Peace out.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Annoyed by my revelations, more baseless, twisted attacks may come on me, through her friends, wellwishers &/or others. Neither obligated nor inclined to respond. Please don‚Äôt believe such nonsense. I may go silent on twitter to heal my family but I won‚Äôt be shamed or silenced.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: To those who abused me last few days, hope you will do right by me now. Ultimately, is this movement about the truth or blindly supporting a particular gender? Please don‚Äôt let your biases make you believe things that are not true.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: A person‚Äôs reputation is their most prized asset and takes a lifetime of work to earn. To have these motivated, fake attacks on me is abhorrent and the sickest thing a person can do. Please don‚Äôt support this kind of smear campaign.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Shame on media like @outlookindia who carried a fake charges story without even checking with me. They could have easily checked on YouTube that I launched her book in 2015/16. Who calls their harasser as chief guest for their book launch? Video here: https://t.co/g6uIOVLjeS

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Also, it is she who comes from very powerful family connected to pol party (regularly dropped top names of people in power then ). i was less known in 2010. was intimidated by her. My old col on Air India talks of entitled IAS kid demanding upgrades at Air India counter. It's her https://t.co/GGNGjZgbz9

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: So who wanted to kiss whom? @iratrivedi‚Äôs self-explanatory email from 2013 to me, esp last line, easily shows her claims from 2010 are false, and she knows this too. This mental harassment of me and my family has to stop. Please don‚Äôt harm a movement with #fakecharges #harassed https://t.co/SWeaSCfHLd

text:

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: In all the cacophony, we may never really know whatever happened in Rafale. However, the political optics of having a name like Ambani on a defense deal are just bad. And now you can't wish it away.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Mr PM considering you wanted to be a beacon of peace, don‚Äôt you think you needed to be more patient than attacking the moment things didn‚Äôt go your way? Our people were killed, difficult to do a hugs session the day that happened isn‚Äôt it? Don‚Äôt give up if u r serious about peace https://t.co/uIABdqjvQU

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Explaining thing in layman terms doesn‚Äôt make you a layman. In fact, it requires a level of clarity and understanding to be able to do so.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: I like to simplify issues so maximum number of people understand it. Those who hide behind complex arguments know their hollowness pretty well. Remember, it is not that simple to be simple.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: This elitist arrogance is an example of people who don‚Äôt want issues to be simplified or get more people involved in a debate. Because you know, only they the so-called intellectuals must own and debate issues. Please ignore such bullies and discuss issues however you want. https://t.co/1aIs7EjfwL

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Trying to understand the Rafale situation better. There are just too many versions at the moment. Any genuine suggestions on some good articles to read on the same? Be civil please and do share the links.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Sometimes when info is not adequate or conflicting the best thing to say is we don‚Äôt have enough to form a view rather than jump to conclusions. This is a developing situation, better to be patient and see what everyone has to say. https://t.co/yaWHsp0nyP

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: #RafaelDeal simplified analogy. Say you order mithai for the neighbourhood, but tell the halwai to take the milk from your bhaiya only. Did someone actually say that? Was milk taken at a fair price? Did halwai choose the milk seller on his own based on quality? We don‚Äôt know yet.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: So now current French govt says something else vs. what ex-French prez Hollande said on the #RafaelDeal. Looks like their politics is just as complicated as ours. With so many versions and few clarifications, impossible to form a view on this at this point.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Indian Government Chose Anil Ambani For Rafale, with no choice - Says ex-French Prez Francois Hollande, according to news reports.   This is a serious charge and about time our government verified and clarified this, and did it fast.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: GST is not just a formula. It is a way of indirect taxation where the indirect tax rates r fixed and doesn't depend on someone judging the product as good/bad/luxury/essential and then setting rates like we did in the 60s. Only works if everything moves into GST - including fuel.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: A scam needs more data points than just mere allegations. There were CAG reports, invoices of purchases made in CWG etc etc. If that happens in this govt, it too will get scam-ridden. So far, there has not been solid basis. Just stating the situation. https://t.co/VzewJg1sFL

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Pointed out high fuel prices in previous regimes. Have also done it now. For those asking why I sounded angrier then, then we had high prices PLUS a scam-a-week. A student who gets lo marks as well as cheats will get scolded more than the student who just gets lo marks right?

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: India is a country where the culture changes every 100km. Accepting diversity has to be the core value of every Indian and frankly is the only way India will survive and thrive. Scrapping #Section377 is a step in that direction. It is a good day for India.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: So #Section377 is decriminalized. An outdated law that needed to go. Congrats to all! For those who want to understand the issue and why it needed to be scrapped. My earlier column : "Section 377 is our collective sin: https://t.co/DSpZcbF6CC via @TOIOpinion

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: As SC rules on #Section377 verdict, it is important for us to know that gay community exists and suffers because of this law. How many of you, privately or openly, identity yourself as gay (individual votes are not visible to others on Twitter)

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Just because I want to have more books and less screen doesn't mean I don't like the screen. Saying but you are typing this on a screen is also so silly. We don't need to polarise every darn thing in the world and make it into this vs that. Love screen. Love books.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: The screen is important. It is fun too. I love it. But books also have their place and magic. It's not books vs screen, it is making them co-exist. Lifts and escalators are great. But you will always have and need stairs.

text: Arithmetic and whether an election is multi-cornered or not matters so much in Indian elections, but is somehow not discussed as much. #bypoll

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: The Modi wave even at its peak gave BJP a few %age points vote share lead. With the wave ebbing, and opposition uniting, simple arithmetic making it very difficult for the BJP to win in several places. Good or bad, shows what 2019 could be like for India.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Appointing a Hindu religious figure as the UP CM gave opposition the legitimacy to come together for a common cause. Costing BJP dearly now in UP.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: You are an editor at a news channel and don't understand currency moves or interest rate parity? That tweet is from 2013. 60-67 is 2.2% depreciation per annum, well below $-INR interest rate differential. Think before u troll please. https://t.co/CkqSqQhoqP

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Yes Mahesh (and other similar trolls). It is from 2013. We are in 2018.  60 to 67 in 5years is a depreciation of 2.2% per annum, which is way lower than $-INR interest rate differential (~6% per annum) or diff in $-INR inflation rates. As a journo, read up interest rate parity. https://t.co/63TfaxGueW

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Stone pelting is not kids playing with pebbles. It‚Äôs a violent attack with hard, heavy, rock-like stones thrown at people. It is not an acceptable means of protest. Stop glorifying it. Stop justifying it. Take action against those doing it.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Always had a problem with #betibachao slogan. Women r not just someone's betis. They r individual citizens with their own passports. And they have the right to feel safe in their country. Not because we want to bachao our betis. Because they r more than betis. They are citizens.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text:
Q: Where were you when (something similar and wrong) happened in the past?
A: I was here only. We were all here, seeing all wrongs happen in India. But now we want something done about it. Why do wrong things in past justify that wrong things in the present should not be fixed?

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: 8-year old cows have better luck than some 8-year old Indian girls.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: It shouldn't take a gruesome killing of an 8-year old for people to react. ANY fundamentalism, ANY means ANY, should be nipped in the bud. Else it only gets more evil and ends like this. If this death affected you, swear to yourself - Zero tolerance for fundamentalism.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: You reach a pinnacle in your career and become a minister or state minister MP or whatever. Then out of political compulsions, you can't even react to the rape and murder of an 8 year old in your country. What use is such power? What's the point of your life?

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: There‚Äôs a child‚Äôs rape and murder. And then there‚Äôs the government‚Äôs reaction to the rape and murder. Both can be equally disturbing events.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: If you are taking political sides in rape cases, you are part of the problem.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Today you are okay with the fringe threatening a movie and its cast, tomorrow the fringe is going to rape and kill little girls.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: I don‚Äôt care about your political compulsions, the ideology of your party, your attachment to a religion and your political loyalties. If you don‚Äôt crack down hard and do so publicly on those who hurt an 8-yr old girl, you don‚Äôt deserve to be an Indian leader.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: @vineetjaintimes hi Vineet can we talk? DM me please.

name: Chetan Bhagat

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: While rural reforms incl the healthcare insurance plan deserves kudos, the budget left a lot to be desired for spurring investment. The one shining spark - a rising stock market - is also under threat now.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Not reducing corporate tax for big corporates was another avoidable move. The mentality that 'big business = bad guys = must keep them under us and in check' runs deep in the govt psyche.  Very hard to change that, and hence we can never get proper growth driven policy.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Throwing in ad-hoc taxes every year spooks investors. The Long Term Capital Gain Tax was avoidable. Signals govt will lure you in markets first, then sting you. Not cool. Markets getting whacked. Global cues making it worse.

name: Chetan Bhagat
text: Reintroducing Long Term Capital Gains Tax not the wisest move. Coupled with bad luck of global selloff, stock markets crashing since budget. Ironically, now there's no capital gains to collect capital gains tax.

text: @anirbanblah There's nothing in the tweet that blames any person or community. It is factual. And facts r pretty widespread.
